works.description:
My name is Martín Casanova, I'm an editor at OVNI Press, a publishing
company in Argentina. I'm authorized to act on behalf of Matíaas Timarchi,

publisher and director of OVNI Press, owner of an exclusive right that is
infringed. Our publishing company owns the copyright for several
comic-book companies, including Marvel Comics, Star Wars Comics, The
Walking Dead, and Hellboy, among others. We've been struggling with
illegal digital copies of the comic books we publish in Argentina (and
other Latin American countries).
Some groups started scanning original comics in English and translated
them to Spanish. After that, they share them so people from all around the

world can download them for free. In some cases, they've scanned our own
translated comics and shared them. These activities have had a very
negative impact in our business, so we can't keep making a blind eye at
them.

One of these groups is called ComicCoon BlogSpot  
(http://http://comicoon.blogspot.com.ar) and is
using your hosting to distribute this unauthorized material. They post
content at issuu.com and distribute it trough your hosting, even when they

aknowledge that it's unauthorized.
